name: combineLatest(_:_:_:)
desc: Subscribes to two additional publishers and invokes a closure upon receiving output from any of the publishers.
declaration: func combineLatest<P, Q, T>(_ publisher1: P, _ publisher2: Q, _ transform: @escaping (Self.Output, P.Output, Q.Output) -> T) -> Publishers.Map<Publishers.CombineLatest3<Self, P, Q>, T> where P : Publisher, Q : Publisher, Self.Failure == P.Failure, P.Failure == Q.Failure
